mapper.select: select from TB4D_TABLE ORDER by TABLE_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(TABLE_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(TABLE_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_TABLE
select * from TB4D_TABLE where TABLE_ORDER_NUM = (select max(TABLE_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_TABLE where TABLE_ORDER_NUM<(select TABLE_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_TABLE where TABLE_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select * from TB4D_TABLE where TABLE_ORDER_NUM = (select min(TABLE_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_TABLE where TABLE_ORDER_NUM>(select TABLE_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_TABLE where TABLE_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
